Text.val: 10.11.2104 SH SCR19295 Added v.VAT instead v.VATPERC to update SRPO descriptions
06.11.2104 GB SCR19295 Changed update value for SRPO_PAYMENT_DESCRIPTION, SRPO_PAYMENT_DESCRIPTION_R
28.10.2014 SH SCR19278 SRPO_PAYMENT_DESCRIPTION (both fields): Removed leading description before INVS_PAYABLENUMBER
06.10.2014 GB SCR19207 Set SCRH_TIME with time()
06.10.2014 SH SCR19193 Extended update SRPO_PAYMENT_DESCRIPTION (both fields) with SFEX_PAYABLENUMBER

ExpSyntax.val: IF(Trim({3,14})='','Payment under invoice '&Trim({3,9})&' as of '&DStr({3,10},'DD-MM-YYYY')&'. VAT of '&Trim(Str({3,37},'N11.2'))&' is included.',Trim({3,14})&' '&'('&Trim({3,8})&')')
IF(Trim({3,14})='','Оплата по счету №” '&Trim({3,9})&' от '&DStr({3,10},'DD-MM-YYYY')&'. Включая НДС в сумме '&Trim(Str({3,37},'N11.2'))&' руб.',Trim({3,14})&' '&'('&Trim({3,8})&')')
